subject: Corel, Autodesk
body:
Of course great hotels have always been social ideas, flawless mirrors to the particular societies they service.

No matter how busy you may think you are, you must find time for reading, or surrender yourself to self-chosen ignorance.

As we acquire more knowledge, things do not become more comprehensible but more mysterious.

Those who hate you don't win unless you hate them and then you destroy yourself.

The bastard! He doesn't exist!

That man is idle who can do something better.

One enemy can do more hurt than ten friends can do good.

The apparel oft proclaims the man.

Bad excuses are worse than none.

People whose sensibility is destroyed by music in trains, airports, lifts, cannot concentrate on a Beethoven Quartet.

Never trust the artist. Trust the tale. The proper function of a critic is to save the tale from the artist who created it.

Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.

More persons, on the whole, are humbugged by believing in nothing than by believing in too much.
